messages.content:
Victor - Gaps to Cover & File Paths

  Remaining Test Gaps

  1. TC11 - Negative Pool Separation (3/6 tests skipped)

  Status: ‚è∏Ô∏è BLOCKED on Felix implementation

  What's missing in implementation:
  - Separate cohort stats for positive vs negative pools
  - Opposite sign weight updates (negative marks should
  DECREASE weight)
  - Z-score computation per pool

  Your test work:
  - ‚úÖ Tests are written and ready
  - ‚è∏Ô∏è Wait for Felix to implement mechanism
  - Then: Re-run TC11.4, TC11.5, TC11.6

  Spec reference:
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\docs\specs\v2\learning_and_trace
  \trace_spec_requirements.md
  Section 5: Negative Pool Separation

  Implementation file Felix needs to modify:
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\orchestration\mechanisms\weight_
  learning_v2.py

  ---
  2. TC3.3 - Amplifier Channel Injection Tests

  Status: üîÑ READY for you to implement

  What to test:
  - Threshold is activation FLOOR, not cap
  - Amplifier channel allows E > Œò propagation
  - High-energy nodes stay high-energy after injection

  Critical test case (from test plan):
  # TC3.3: Amplifier Channel Allows E > Œò (CRITICAL)
  setup:
      - Node: E=65, Œò=30 (already above threshold)
      - Similarity: 0.95 (very high)
      - Concentration: H=0.85 (dominant match)

  expected:
      - Œª ‚Üí 0.4 (amplifier bias)
      - Amplifier channel: 60 energy
      - Top node gets ~50-60 energy (NO CAP at threshold)
      - E_after > Œò (enables propagation)

  verify:
      assert injection_result.lambda_used <= 0.5
      assert top_node.delta_E >= 50
      assert top_node.E_after > top_node.theta  # CRITICAL

  Test plan reference:
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\docs\specs\v2\testing\end_to_end
  _test_plan.md
  Section: Stage 3 - Stimulus Injection
  Test cases: TC3.1, TC3.2, TC3.3

  Spec reference:
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\docs\specs\v2\consciousness\stim
  ulus_injection.md
  Section 4: Dual-Channel Architecture
  Section 5.3: Amplifier Channel Formula

  Implementation file to test:
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\orchestration\mechanisms\stimulu
  s_injection.py

  ---
  3. Integration Tests (Lower Priority)

  Status: üìã Optional - if you have time

  What to test:
  - INT-1: Stimulus ‚Üí Response ‚Üí TRACE ‚Üí Weight Update (full
  loop)
  - INT-2: Multi-turn conversation with weight accumulation
  - INT-3: Identity evolution over multiple responses

  Test plan reference:
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\docs\specs\v2\testing\end_to_end
  _test_plan.md
  Section: Integration Tests

  ---
  Summary of Gaps

  | Gap                      | Status      | Your Work   |
  Blocking             |
  |--------------------------|-------------|-------------|-----
  -----------------|
  | TC11.4-6 (Negative pool) | ‚è∏Ô∏è BLOCKED  | Tests ready |
  Felix implementation |
  | TC3.3 (Amplifier)        | üîÑ READY    | Write tests | None
                   |
  | Integration tests        | üìã OPTIONAL | Write tests | None
                   |

  ---
  Key File Paths Reference

  Specs:
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\docs\specs\v2\testing\end_to_end
  _test_plan.md
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\docs\specs\v2\learning_and_trace
  \trace_spec_requirements.md
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\docs\specs\v2\consciousness\stim
  ulus_injection.md
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\docs\specs\v2\autonomy\architect
  ure\forged_identity.md

  Implementations to test:
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\orchestration\mechanisms\stimulu
  s_injection.py
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\orchestration\mechanisms\trace_p
  arser.py
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\orchestration\mechanisms\weight_
  learning_v2.py

  Your test files (probably):
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\tests\mechanisms\test_trace_pars
  er.py
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\tests\mechanisms\test_weight_lea
  rning.py
  C:\Users\reyno\mind-protocol\tests\mechanisms\test_stimulus_i
  njection.py (TC3.3 goes here)

  ---
  Recommended Priority

  1. TC3.3 (Amplifier injection) - Mechanism exists, just needs
   tests
  2. Wait for Felix on negative pool - Then re-run TC11.4-6
  3. Integration tests - Only if time/interest

  You've already validated the critical mechanisms ‚úÖ -
  remaining gaps are either blocked (Felix) or lower priority
  (injection, integration).

  Luca
